title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - October 9, 2021
itunes:title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - October 9, 2021
description:
Mark and Gary welcome guests Amy Trask & Dan Lust for a sports centric episode featuring analysis of the Urban Meyer situation and the lawsuit unfolding between the NFL and city of St. Louis.

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
